metadata.title: CVE-2016-9399 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: The calcstepsizes function in jpc_dec.c in JasPer 1.900.22 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (assertion failure) via unspecifiedvectors.

criterions.comment: jasper: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
